forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.emailDescription: We'll send a password reset link to this email address.
forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: If an account exists with that email, we've sent a password reset link. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
forgotPassword.checkSpam: If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.
forgotPassword.error: Failed to send password reset email

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
resetPassword.errorDescription: The reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new password reset link.

auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.registerDescription: Enter your information to get started
auth.passwordDescription: Must be at least 8 characters. Click the key icon to generate a strong password.
auth.companyNameDescription: This will create your subdomain (e.g., mycompany.passstorage.com). Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed.
auth.findYourCompanyDescription: Enter your company name to find your login page.
auth.companyNotFound: Company not found. Please check the company name and try again.

emailVerification.verifyingDescription: Please wait while we verify your email address...
emailVerification.successDescription: Your email address has been successfully verified. You can now use all features of the application.
emailVerification.errorDescription: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new verification email.
emailVerification.emailSent: Verification email sent successfully. Please check your inbox.
emailVerification.verificationRequired: Please verify your email address to access all features.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of your password management system
dashboard.noActivitiesDescription: Activity will appear here as users perform actions in the system
dashboard.noSecurityAlerts: No active security alerts. Your system is secure.
dashboard.systemHealthDescription: Overview of system performance and status
dashboard.noHealthDataDescription: System health metrics will appear here once data is available
dashboard.activeSessionsDescription: {{count}} active session{{count, plural, one {} other {s}}} currently
dashboard.weakPasswordsDetected_one: {{count}} weak password detected. Consider strengthening it.
dashboard.weakPasswordsDetected_other: {{count}} weak passwords detected. Consider strengthening them.
dashboard.failedLoginsCritical: Critical: {{count}} failed login attempts detected in last 24 hours
dashboard.unusualLoginActivity: Unusual login activity detected ({{count}} failed attempts in last 24h)
dashboard.suspiciousAccessPattern: Suspicious access pattern: {{count}} IP address{{count, plural, one {} other {es}}} with multiple failed login attempts
dashboard.expiringPasswords: {{count}} password{{count, plural, one {} other {s}}} will expire in the next 7 days
dashboard.unusedPasswords_one: {{count}} password hasn't been accessed in 90+ days. Consider reviewing.
dashboard.unusedPasswords_other: {{count}} passwords haven't been accessed in 90+ days. Consider reviewing.
dashboard.breachedPasswords_one: {{count}} password has been found in a data breach. Change it immediately.
dashboard.breachedPasswords_other: {{count}} passwords have been found in data breaches. Change them immediately.
dashboard.rotationReminders_one: {{count}} password needs rotation soon. Update it to maintain security.
dashboard.rotationReminders_other: {{count}} passwords need rotation soon. Update them to maintain security.
dashboard.backupCompleted: System backup completed successfully {{hours}} hour{{hours, plural, one {} other {s}}} ago
dashboard.backupOld: Last system backup was {{days}} day{{days, plural, one {} other {s}}} ago
dashboard.backupFailed: System backup failed. Please check backup configuration.
dashboard.backupUnknown: System backup status unknown. Please verify backup configuration.

users.title: Users
users.createUser: Create a new user account and assign permissions
users.updateUser: Update user account details and permissions
users.passwordDescription: Minimum 8 characters. Click the key icon to generate a strong password.
users.requireMfaDescription: User must set up two-factor authentication
users.isActiveDescription: User can log in and access the system
users.resetPasswordDescription: Reset password for {{userName}}. As an admin, you don't need to provide the current password.
users.resetPasswordDescriptionGeneric: Enter a new password for this user
users.resetPasswordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters and meet security requirements. Click the key icon to generate a strong password.
users.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user account and remove their data from our servers.
users.noUsersDescription: Get started by creating your first user account. Users can access the system based on their assigned roles and permissions.
users.noUsersSearchDescription: No users match your search criteria. Try adjusting your search terms.

passwords.title: Passwords
passwords.description: Manage and organize all stored passwords
passwords.noFolders: No folders yet. Create one to get started.
passwords.passwordDescription: Click the key icon to generate a strong password
passwords.totpAuthDescription: Add two-factor authentication for enhanced security
passwords.totpInstructionsTitle: How to get your TOTP secret key:
passwords.totpInstruction1: Open the website/app you want to secure with 2FA
passwords.totpInstruction2: Go to Security Settings and enable Two-Factor Authentication
passwords.totpInstruction4: Click "Can't scan QR code?" or "Enter manually" option
passwords.totpInstruction5: Copy the displayed secret key (usually 16-32 characters)
passwords.totpTip: You can also click the QR code button to scan directly from your screen
passwords.weakPasswordMessage: {{count}} password is using weak security. Consider updating it for better protection.
passwords.weakPasswordMessage_plural: {{count}} passwords are using weak security. Consider updating them for better protection.
passwords.expiringPasswordMessage: {{count}} password will expire within the next 7 days. Update it to maintain access.
passwords.expiringPasswordMessage_plural: {{count}} passwords will expire within the next 7 days. Update them to maintain access.
passwords.noPasswordsDescription: Get started by creating your first password entry. Store and manage all your passwords securely in one place.
passwords.noPasswordsSearchDescription: No passwords match your search criteria. Try adjusting your search terms.

search.advancedSearchDescription: Search across all fields with advanced filters and options
search.searchQueryDescription: Search text that will be matched against selected fields
search.searchFieldsDescription: Select which fields to search in
search.atLeastOneField: At least one search field must be selected
search.foldersDescription: Select folders to search in (includes subfolders)
search.saveAsNameDescription: Enter a name to save this search for quick access
search.editNameDescription: Edit the name of this saved search
search.saveNameRequired: Please enter a name for the saved search
search.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this saved search? This action cannot be undone.

templates.title: Password Templates
templates.description: Create and manage password templates for quick password creation
templates.createTemplateDescription: Create a new password template with default fields
templates.noTemplatesDescription: Create your first template to get started with quick password creation
templates.noTemplatesFoundDescription: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
templates.name: Template Name
templates.serviceDescription: The service or platform this template is for
templates.iconDescription: Choose an emoji or icon to represent this template
templates.makePublicDescription: Allow others in your organization to use this template
templates.defaultFieldsDescription: Set default values that will be pre-filled when using this template
templates.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this template? This action cannot be undone.

import.title: Import Passwords
import.description: Import passwords from CSV, JSON, or popular password managers
import.importingDescription: Please wait while we import your passwords
import.dragDropDescription: or click to browse files (CSV, JSON, TXT, 1PIF)
import.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select a CSV, JSON, TXT, or 1PIF file.
import.completeDescription: Your passwords have been successfully imported

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Manage tags, colors, and icons for better organization
tags.tagDialogDescription: Create or edit a tag with optional color and icon
tags.analyticsDescription: Most used tags across your passwords
tags.noTags: No tags created yet. Create your first tag to get started.
tags.deleteTagDescription: This will remove the tag from all passwords. This action cannot be undone.

export.title: Export Passwords
export.description: Export your passwords in various formats with filtering options
export.encryptedDescription: Export passwords in encrypted format for secure backup
export.encryptionKeyRequired: Encryption key is required for encrypted exports
export.includeSharedDescription: Include passwords shared with you by teams

bulk.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete {{count}} password. This action cannot be undone.
bulk.deleteWarning_plural: This will permanently delete {{count}} passwords. This action cannot be undone.
bulk.selectTags: Please select at least one tag
bulk.noTagsAvailable: No tags available. Create tags first to use this feature.

history.title: Password History
history.description: View and restore previous versions of {{name}}
history.noHistory: No history available for this password
history.restoreConfirm: Are you sure you want to restore this version? This will create a new version with the restored data and cannot be undone.
history.compareDescription: Compare different versions of this password
history.compareSummaryDescription: Overview of differences between the selected versions
history.changesDescription: Detailed breakdown of all field changes between versions

duplicates.title: Duplicate Detection
duplicates.description: Find and resolve duplicate, reused, and similar passwords
duplicates.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete {{count}} password entry. This action cannot be undone.
duplicates.deleteDescription_plural: This will permanently delete {{count}} password entries. This action cannot be undone.
duplicates.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} password? All associated data will be permanently removed.
duplicates.deleteWarning_plural: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} passwords? All associated data will be permanently removed.
duplicates.mergeDescription: This will merge {{count}} password entry into one. The selected password will be kept and others will be deleted.
duplicates.mergeDescription_plural: This will merge {{count}} password entries into one. The selected password will be kept and others will be deleted.
duplicates.mergeWarning: Are you sure you want to merge {{count}} password? The selected password will be kept and others will be permanently deleted.
duplicates.mergeWarning_plural: Are you sure you want to merge {{count}} passwords? The selected password will be kept and others will be permanently deleted.
duplicates.noDuplicatesDescription: Great! All your passwords are unique.
duplicates.noReusedDescription: Excellent! You're not reusing passwords across multiple entries.
duplicates.noSimilarDescription: Perfect! All your passwords are sufficiently different.

breach.title: Password Breach Detection
breach.description: Check if your passwords have been exposed in data breaches
breach.detected: This password has been found {{count}} time in data breaches
breach.detected_plural: This password has been found {{count}} times in data breaches
breach.historyDescription: History of all password breach checks
breach.noBreachHistory: No breach history available. Check your passwords to see if they've been exposed.
breach.resolveDescription: This will mark the breach as resolved. Make sure you've changed the password before resolving.
breach.learnMore: Learn more about Have I Been Pwned

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.description: Quick access to your favorite passwords
favorites.noFavorites: No favorite passwords yet. Mark passwords as favorites for quick access.
favorites.noFavoritesFound: No favorite passwords found matching your search.

rotation.title: Password Rotation
rotation.description: Manage password rotation policies and schedules
rotation.noPolicies: No rotation policies found. Create one to get started.
rotation.noReminders: No rotation reminders at this time.
rotation.rotationDaysHint: Number of days between password rotations
rotation.reminderDaysHint: Days before rotation to send reminder
rotation.deletePolicyDescription: This will remove the policy from all assigned passwords. This action cannot be undone.
rotation.rotationDueDescription: This password needs to be rotated. Please update it to maintain security.
rotation.autoRotateEnabled: Auto-rotate is enabled - rotate manually when due
rotation.autoRotateDescription: A new strong password will be generated and the password will be automatically rotated. Make sure to copy and save the new password.
rotation.newPasswordDescription: Your password has been rotated. Please copy and save this new password securely:
rotation.copyPasswordHint: Click the button below to copy the password to your clipboard

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: Manage teams and organize password access
teams.createTeamDescription: Create a team to organize users and manage password access
teams.noTeamsDescription: Get started by creating your first team. Teams help organize users and manage password access more efficiently.
teams.noTeamsSearchDescription: No teams match your search criteria. Try adjusting your search terms.
teams.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the team and remove all associated members and password shares.

roles.title: Roles & Permissions
roles.description: Define roles and manage access permissions
roles.noRolesDescription: Get started by creating your first custom role. Define permissions and assign them to users to control access to system features.
roles.noRolesSearchDescription: No roles match your search criteria. Try adjusting your search terms.
roles.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the role and remove all associated permissions. Users assigned to this role will need to be reassigned.
roles.createRoleDescription: Define a custom role with specific permissions

settings.title: Settings
settings.mfaCredentialsDescription: Configure credentials for SMS and WebAuthn MFA methods

mfaCredentialsSettings.title: MFA Credentials
mfaCredentialsSettings.description: Configure credentials for SMS and WebAuthn MFA methods
mfaCredentialsSettings.smsDescription: Configure Twilio credentials for SMS-based MFA. Required if SMS MFA is enabled.
mfaCredentialsSettings.smsAccountSidDescription: Your Twilio Account SID from the Twilio Console
mfaCredentialsSettings.smsAuthTokenDescription: Your Twilio Auth Token from the Twilio Console
mfaCredentialsSettings.smsPhoneNumberDescription: The Twilio phone number to send SMS from (E.164 format)
mfaCredentialsSettings.webauthnDescription: Configure WebAuthn settings for hardware security key authentication. Required if WebAuthn MFA is enabled.
mfaCredentialsSettings.webauthnRpIdDescription: Your domain name (e.g., example.com). Must match your application domain.
mfaCredentialsSettings.webauthnRpNameDescription: The name displayed to users when registering security keys
mfaCredentialsSettings.webauthnOriginDescription: The origin URL of your application (e.g., https://example.com)

settings.appNameDescription: The name displayed throughout the application
settings.generalSettingsDescription: Configure general system settings and preferences
settings.themeDescription: Choose the color theme for the application. System will match your device preference.
settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application
settings.readOnlyAccess: You have read-only access to these settings. Only users with edit permissions can modify them.
settings.emailSettingsDescription: Configure email notifications and delivery settings

email.smtpConfigurationDescription: Configure email server settings for notifications
email.smtpAuthOptional: Leave blank if your SMTP server doesn't require authentication
email.fromEmailDescription: Email address used as sender for notifications
email.testEmailDescription: Send a test email to verify your SMTP settings
email.emailNotificationsDescription: Configure which events trigger email notifications
email.newUserRegistrationDescription: Email admins when new users register
email.passwordSharedDescription: Email users when passwords are shared with them

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Configure password policies and security requirements
security.passwordPoliciesDescription: Define password strength and complexity requirements
security.passwordExpiryDescription: Number of days before password must be changed (0 = never)
security.sessionManagementDescription: Configure user session and timeout settings
security.sessionTimeoutDescription: Automatically log out inactive users after this time
security.maxConcurrentSessionsDescription: Maximum number of active sessions per user
security.requireReauthDescription: Require password confirmation for critical operations
security.loginSecurityDescription: Configure login attempt limits and account lockout
security.maxFailedLoginAttemptsDescription: Lock account after this many failed login attempts
security.accountLockoutDurationDescription: How long to lock the account

mfa.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
mfa.enforceAllUsersDescription: Require all users to enable MFA
mfa.enforceAdminsDescription: Require admin users to enable MFA
mfa.availableMethodsDescription: Select which MFA methods users can choose from
mfa.smsNotConfigured: SMS credentials not configured. Configure them in
mfa.smsMustBeConfigured: SMS credentials must be configured first. Please configure them in Settings ‚Üí MFA Credentials.
mfa.webauthnNotConfigured: WebAuthn credentials not configured. Configure them in
mfa.webauthnMustBeConfigured: WebAuthn credentials must be configured first. Please configure them in Settings ‚Üí MFA Credentials.
mfa.gracePeriodDaysDescription: Allow users this many days to set up MFA before enforcing
mfa.recoveryOptionsDescription: Configure account recovery methods when MFA is lost
mfa.recoveryCodesInfo: Users can generate and manage their recovery codes in
mfa.recoveryCodesDescription: Allow users to generate backup recovery codes
mfa.adminMfaResetDescription: Allow admins to reset MFA for users

audit.title: Audit Logs
audit.description: View system activity and security events
audit.searchPlaceholder: Search by user, action, resource, or IP...
audit.noLogsMatchingFilters: No logs found matching your filters

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: View and manage your account information
profile.changePasswordDescription: Update your password. You must provide your current password to change it.
profile.newPasswordDescription: Password must be at least 8 characters and meet security requirements. Click the key icon to generate a strong password.
profile.phoneNumberDescription: Your phone number for SMS MFA and contact
profile.bioDescription: A brief description about yourself (max 500 characters)

recoveryEmail.title: Recovery Email
recoveryEmail.description: Set a secondary email address for account recovery. This email will be used if you forget your password.
recoveryEmail.setDescription: Enter a secondary email address that will be used for account recovery.
recoveryEmail.setSuccess: Recovery email set successfully. Please verify it by clicking the link in the email.
recoveryEmail.notSet: No recovery email set. It's recommended to set one for account security.
recoveryEmail.verificationRequired: Please verify your recovery email by clicking the link sent to your email.

securityQuestions.title: Security Questions
securityQuestions.description: Set up security questions to help recover your account if you forget your password.
securityQuestions.setDescription: Choose at least 2 security questions and provide answers. These will be used for account recovery.
securityQuestions.notSet: No security questions set. It's recommended to set them for account recovery.
securityQuestions.question: Question
securityQuestions.minRequired: At least 2 security questions are required
securityQuestions.allFieldsRequired: All questions and answers are required

profile.invalidImageType: Invalid image type. Please upload a valid image file.
profile.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
profile.preferencesDescription: Customize your account preferences and settings
profile.enableEmailNotificationsDescription: Receive email notifications for important events
profile.passwordExpiryAlertsDescription: Get notified when passwords are about to expire
profile.weeklyReportsDescription: Receive weekly summary reports via email
profile.activityDescription: View your recent activity and actions
profile.noActivityDescription: Your activity will appear here once you start using the system
profile.statisticsDescription: View your account statistics and usage
profile.accountInfoDescription: Your account creation and login information

sessions.activeSessionsDescription: Manage your active sessions and devices
sessions.loginHistoryDescription: View your login history with IP addresses
sessions.noActiveSessionsDescription: You don't have any active sessions at the moment
sessions.noLoginHistoryDescription: Your login history will appear here
sessions.revokeConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to revoke this session? You will be logged out from this device.
sessions.revokeAllConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to revoke all other sessions? You will remain logged in on this device only.

errors.companyNameMinLength: Company name must be at least 2 characters
errors.companyNameInvalid: Company name can only contain letters, numbers, and hyphens
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters

mfa.enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
mfa.verifyDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to continue.
mfa.setupDescription: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app and enter the 6-digit code to complete setup.
mfa.recoveryCodeFormat: Format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX (use a recovery code you saved earlier)
mfa.setupComplete: MFA setup complete! You can now access your account.
mfa.recoveryCodesDescription: Manage backup codes to access your account if you lose your MFA device
mfa.recoveryCodesGenerated: Recovery codes generated successfully. Please save them now!
mfa.saveCodesSecure: Save these codes in a secure location. Each code can only be used once.
mfa.importantRecoveryCodes: IMPORTANT: If you lose access to your MFA device, use one of these codes to access your account.
mfa.securityNotice1: - Store these codes in a secure, private location
mfa.securityNotice2: - Do not share these codes with anyone
mfa.securityNotice3: - Each code can only be used once
mfa.securityNotice4: - Generate new codes if you suspect they have been compromised
mfa.recoveryCodesNotEnabled: Recovery codes are not enabled by your administrator.
mfa.noRecoveryCodes: You don't have any recovery codes. Generate them now to secure your account.
mfa.allCodesUsedDescription: All your recovery codes have been used. Generate new ones to maintain account access.
mfa.saveCodesSafe: Save these codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once.
mfa.saveCodesNow: Save these codes now. You won't be able to see them again after closing this dialog.
mfa.clickToGenerate: Click the button below to generate recovery codes

welcome.title: Welcome to PassStorage!
welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started with a quick tour of the key features
welcome.description: We're excited to have you here! This quick tour will help you get the most out of PassStorage.

passwords.title: Secure Password Management
passwords.description: Store, organize, and manage all your passwords in one secure place. Create folders, add tags, and keep your credentials safe.

security.title: Enhanced Security Features
security.description: Enable two-factor authentication, set up password rotation policies, and monitor security alerts to keep your account protected.

teams.title: Team Collaboration
teams.description: Share passwords securely with your team, create groups, and manage permissions to collaborate effectively.

onboarding.skipped: You can always access the getting started checklist from your dashboard.
onboarding.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

checklist.title: Getting Started Checklist
checklist.description: Complete these steps to get the most out of PassStorage
checklist.createPasswordDesc: Add your first password to start securing your credentials
checklist.setupMfaDesc: Enable MFA to add an extra layer of security to your account
checklist.createTeamDesc: Collaborate with your team by creating or joining a team
checklist.exploreDashboardDesc: Get familiar with your dashboard and view your security overview
checklist.organizeTagsDesc: Create tags to categorize and quickly find your passwords
checklist.useTemplatesDesc: Create reusable templates to speed up password entry
checklist.checkBreachesDesc: Scan your passwords against known data breach databases
checklist.setupRotationDesc: Configure automatic password rotation policies for better security

welcome.title: Welcome to PassStorage!
welcome.description: Let's take a comprehensive tour of all features. We'll highlight each section as we go.

dashboard.title: Dashboard Overview
dashboard.description: Your central command center. View statistics, recent activities, security alerts, and system health at a glance.

passwords.title: Password Management
passwords.description: Store, organize, and manage all your passwords. Create folders, add tags, and keep your credentials secure.

passwordsFavorites.title: Favorite Passwords
passwordsFavorites.description: Quick access to your most-used passwords. Mark passwords as favorites for easy retrieval.

passwordsTags.title: Password Tags
passwordsTags.description: Organize passwords with custom tags. Use tags to filter, search, and categorize your credentials.

passwordsTemplates.title: Password Templates
passwordsTemplates.description: Create reusable password templates with predefined fields. Speed up password entry with templates.

passwordsDuplicates.title: Duplicate Detection
passwordsDuplicates.description: Find and manage duplicate passwords across your vault. Identify reused credentials for better security.

passwordsBreaches.title: Breach Detection
passwordsBreaches.description: Monitor your passwords against known data breaches. Get alerts when your credentials appear in breach databases.

passwordsRotation.title: Password Rotation
passwordsRotation.description: Set up automatic password rotation policies. Schedule password changes and receive reminders.

passwordsSearch.title: Advanced Search
passwordsSearch.description: Powerful search capabilities with filters, tags, folders, and saved searches. Find passwords instantly.

users.title: User Management
users.description: Manage team members, assign roles, and control access. Create, edit, and manage user accounts.

teams.title: Team Collaboration
teams.description: Create teams, share passwords securely, and collaborate with your organization. Manage team members and permissions.

roles.title: Roles & Permissions
roles.description: Define custom roles with granular permissions. Control what users can access and modify.

audit.title: Audit Logs
audit.description: Track all system activities and changes. Monitor user actions, password access, and security events.

settings.title: Settings & Configuration
settings.description: Configure your account, security settings, MFA, email preferences, and system-wide options.

search.title: Advanced Search
search.description: Powerful search capabilities with filters, tags, folders, and saved searches. Find passwords instantly.

tags.title: Password Tags
tags.description: Organize passwords with custom tags. Use tags to filter, search, and categorize your credentials.

favorites.title: Favorite Passwords
favorites.description: Quick access to your most-used passwords. Mark passwords as favorites for easy retrieval.

templates.title: Password Templates
templates.description: Create reusable password templates with predefined fields. Speed up password entry with templates.

rotation.title: Password Rotation
rotation.description: Set up automatic password rotation policies. Schedule password changes and receive reminders.

breachDetection.title: Breach Detection
breachDetection.description: Monitor your passwords against known data breaches. Get alerts when your credentials appear in breach databases.

duplicateDetection.title: Duplicate Detection
duplicateDetection.description: Find and manage duplicate passwords across your vault. Identify reused credentials for better security.

auditLogs.title: Audit Logs
auditLogs.description: Track all system activities and changes. Monitor user actions, password access, and security events.

settingsGeneral.title: General Settings
settingsGeneral.description: Configure general application settings, theme preferences, language, and display options.

settingsEmail.title: Email Settings
settingsEmail.description: Configure email notifications, SMTP settings, and email templates for system notifications.

settingsSecurity.title: Security Settings
settingsSecurity.description: Manage security policies, password requirements, session settings, and security preferences.

settingsMfa.title: MFA Settings
settingsMfa.description: Configure multi-factor authentication settings, authentication methods, and MFA policies.

settingsMfaCredentials.title: MFA Credentials
settingsMfaCredentials.description: Manage your multi-factor authentication credentials, backup codes, and authentication devices.
